attributes.action: stop george bush from attacking and killing millions of  people in iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is well known throughout the world that George Bush plans to attack iran.If he does ,they will do it with the help of the united kingdom.Millians of people will die again in the name of 'The war on terror'.
I dont want that to happen and I'm sure you dont either so please sign my petition.
